LanguageData.TD.ReplaceDesc: Replace stuff of a thing, e.g. replace a wood wall with stone
LanguageData.TD.SettingsNoOverwallCoolers: Hide those super-nifty over-wall coolers from the build menu
LanguageData.TD.SettingsNoNormalCoolers: Hide the normal cooler and vent from the build menu
LanguageData.TD.SettingsCornerBuildable: Corner tiles are buildable and mineable from inside
LanguageData.TD.SettingsCornerBuildableDesc: This might sometime cause weird pathing issues - turn it off to maybe fix that.
